questions.question: What is machine learning?
options: A method of training computers to make decisions
A type of language used in programming
A physical machine for learning purposes
A type of computer hardware
questions.correct_answer: A method of training computers to make decisions

questions.question: What is supervised learning?
options: Learning with a teacher
Learning without any guidance
Learning from past experiences
Learning in a classroom setting

questions.question: Which algorithm is commonly used for linear regression?
options: Support Vector Machine
K-Nearest Neighbors
Decision Tree
Least Squares

questions.question: What is overfitting in machine learning?
options: A model that is too simple to capture the underlying patterns in data
A model that is complex and memorizes the training examples without generalizing well
A method of underfitting the data
A bias-variance tradeoff scenario
questions.correct_answer: A model that is complex and memorizes the training examples without generalizing well

questions.question: In classification tasks, what does precision measure?
options: The ability of the model to predict positive cases correctly
The ability of the model to predict negative cases correctly
The proportion of correctly classified positives among the total predicted positives
The proportion of correctly classified negatives among the total predicted negatives
questions.correct_answer: The ability of the model to predict positive cases correctly
